CHANGELOG
======================

2.1.6 (23.04.2019)
----- 
- enforced PSR-12
- simpler API
- less dependencies

2.0.1 (26.08.2018)
-----
- better logging for failed analysis

2.0.0 (25.08.2018)
-----
- removed old dependencies
- phpunit version bump
- core version bump
- removed highlighter
- getClasses() now returns ReflectionClass instead of array

0.9.0 (07.02.2017)
-----
* Split from Common package
